title: Doggie is feeling a bit better now
body:
After being in the hospital for the entire day she finally came home. It took a long time there because it took awhile to take an xray of her paw because she was in so much pain. They don't know what's the matter with her and she doesn't have a broken leg so it's probably something else. In the meantime she is on anti inflammatory medication and pain killers to see if that helps her out. I'm still nervous about her because it's nothing as simple as a broken leg.
I got to pet a lot of dogs today at least. 
Thanks for the support guys, I didn't read your comments until I just got back home now.

https://i.imgur.com/Vlrq5XE.jpg
